name: Thank you... For Loving me!!!
text: Main If your leader's type includes {Whitebeard Pirates} in it, look at the top 3 cards of your deck, reveal up to one card with {Whitebeard Pirates} included in its types, or [Monkey D. Luffy] and put it into your hand. Then, place the rest of the cards on the top or bottom of your deck in any order.
